LABEL: 0xCD
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0xDD
STRING: Is this dream, or reality?

LABEL: 0x16A
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x17A
STRING: The boundaries between the two are blurred, leading to one possibility.

LABEL: 0x213
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x223
STRING: Another future for these women may have bloomed somewhere else.

LABEL: 0x2BE
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x2CE
STRING: There's a fragment of Ivy here. It's what she, the savior, ended up with.

LABEL: 0x379
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x389
STRING: Let's look into that fragment.

LABEL: 0x5AD
STRING: She has the appearance of a fairy running about in the modern age.

LABEL: 0x601
STRING: She wears a gothic dress; her twin tails swing silently.

LABEL: 0x659
STRING: Her red and blue eyes stare at the enemy she has cornered.

LABEL: 0x6CA
STRING: That's enough, Darkness of the World!!

LABEL: 0x714
STRING: She speaks in a high voice.

LABEL: 0x752
STRING: It was her declaration as the Savior, which would precede the beginning of the end for the Darkness.

LABEL: 0x7C7
STRING: This world has been poisoned by something invisible... It is our task to cleanse it.

LABEL: 0x887
STRING: Clara

LABEL: 0x89B
STRING: I am Il Salvatore%R(5,Savior), who will exorcise the darkness, Clara Moemori! In order to destroy injustice, disappear, Darkness of the World...!

LABEL: 0x938
STRING: It's true. She's the Savior of this intensely cruel and unreasonable world.

LABEL: 0x994
STRING: The one I love... is Clara Moemori.

LABEL: 0xA97
STRING: After watching her hero-esque scene earlier, we were walking around the city.

LABEL: 0xB4B
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xB5B
STRING: I'm so tired... It's so hard to be Clara...

LABEL: 0xBBD
STRING: Next to me was a woman.

LABEL: 0xC01
STRING: I call out to her and hand her a drink.

LABEL: 0xCAC
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xCBC
STRING: Oh! Thank you, Itarou...!

LABEL: 0xD20
STRING: What was her true identity? The shy Moeko, standing by me right now?

LABEL: 0xD88
STRING: Or the savior figure, the confident Clara Moemori?

LABEL: 0xDF8
STRING: The passers-by didn't seem to notice what was going on.

LABEL: 0xE8E
STRING: A cosplay event is happening in Akiba.

LABEL: 0xEF6
STRING: We were surrounded by many people in cosplay costumes.

LABEL: 0xF52
STRING: Perhaps because Clara was in cosplay, they thought she was putting on a performance.

LABEL: 0xFCE
STRING: How foolish they are, to not notice an angel among them.

LABEL: 0x1044
STRING: That is the difference...

LABEL: 0x108D
STRING: That girl with the lolita dress is so cute! I wonder what her name is!

LABEL: 0x10FA
STRING: Oh, it looks like people are beginning to notice her.

LABEL: 0x116B
STRING: Oh, her? Anyway, I liked the girl I passed earlier better.

LABEL: 0x1214
STRING: What's with that guy... Doesn't he realize how good Clara is?

LABEL: 0x1272
STRING: Dude, she's an angel! If his eyes were burned by Clara's brilliance, I'd understand.

LABEL: 0x12EC
STRING: Well, it can't be helped. I'll have to teach him a lesson.

LABEL: 0x1392
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x13A2
STRING: Oh, Itarou...? What's with that scary look?

LABEL: 0x1400
STRING: Don't worry, Moeko. I'm going to work extra hard now, too.

LABEL: 0x14A1
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x14B1
STRING: Even when you claim to be a hero who understands his faults?

LABEL: 0x1502
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x1512
STRING: Don't cause a scene! If you didn't know, Clara's a secret!

LABEL: 0x1590
STRING: Moeko pulls my hand in a panic, and I have no choice but to relent.

LABEL: 0x15EC
STRING: Moeko and I begin walking again, looking for our next foe.

LABEL: 0x16A9
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x16B9
STRING: Itarou, I'd like to ask you one question. May I?

LABEL: 0x171F
STRING: Moeko asks this with such an anxious look.

LABEL: 0x1767
STRING: I can't believe she and Clara are the same person.

LABEL: 0x17FC
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x180C
STRING: Oh, uh, you know... uh...

LABEL: 0x189D
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x18AD
STRING: Which one you really like, Itarou?

LABEL: 0x1911
STRING: The clamour from the crowd grew louder.

LABEL: 0x19B2
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x19C2
STRING: When I told you my secret, you accepted me. I was so happy.

LABEL: 0x1A45
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x1A55
STRING: But Itarou seems to be looking at just Clara, not me...

LABEL: 0x1ABA
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x1ACA
STRING: So, I... I'm a bit nervous. I'm afraid that I'll be thrown away.

LABEL: 0x1B4F
STRING: I can't see Moeko's expression very well as she looks down.

LABEL: 0x1BA3
STRING: But somehow, it seemed she was holding back tears.

LABEL: 0x1BFB
STRING: I'm sure it's because I, of all people, was making her uneasy.

LABEL: 0x1CA9
STRING: Moeko looked up.

LABEL: 0x1CE3
STRING: Moeko's eyes, staring at me, were shaking with anxiety and anticipation.

LABEL: 0x1D39
STRING: I-I like both of you.

LABEL: 0x1D77
STRING: But the most important one is you... Moeko.

LABEL: 0x1DC3
STRING: Otherwise, I wouldn't be with such a shy person like you.

LABEL: 0x1E2D
STRING: I admit I hated you at first, but not anymore.

LABEL: 0x1EBC
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x1ECC
STRING: Itarou...

LABEL: 0x1F06
STRING: Clara is a sweetheart. Moeko is the one I love. Is that not enough?

LABEL: 0x1FAD
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x1FBD
STRING: Nope, I'm satisfied!

LABEL: 0x1FFD
STRING: Moeko takes my hand.

LABEL: 0x203C
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x204C
STRING: Itarou, please stay with me from now on. We will save the world, and after that...

LABEL: 0x20CB
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x20DB
STRING: Stay with me, forever and ever!

LABEL: 0x212C
STRING: And so Clara the Savior will save the world.

LABEL: 0x2184
STRING: What is left after that will be...

LABEL: 0x21CA
STRING: It must be Moeko's smile as she holds my hand.

LABEL: 0x2216
STRING: Her hands will never leave mine.
